    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Disguise](/Feats.aspx?ID=823) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 264 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

You can set up a disguise in half the usual time (generally 5 minutes). If you’re a master, it takes one-tenth the usual time (usually 1 minute). If you’re legendary, you can create a full disguise and Impersonate as a 3-action activity.
name: Quick Disguise
